backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and store checklist entries with admin-gated queries and timestampâ€‘based sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an admin dashboard filter feature to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend pages, components, hooks, utils, and styling behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with industrial OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and a root layout that clears sessions and cache when identity changes.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with app branding and logout logic that clears identity, cache, and admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout containing header, footer, and wrapper for routed content.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureMod: Camera modal providing live preview, photo capture, error messaging, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItemCar: Checklist item card showing status and preview with a camera modal trigger for capturing photos.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: React modal for entering and saving a user's name using a controlled input and save callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin credentials in state and sessionStorage with helpers to read, save, and clear them.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Wraps useActor to provide readiness, loading, error states, and a retry mechanism for backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for user profiles, checklist entries, and admin entry retrieval with backend actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark mode theme variables and global utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page showing filtered checklist entries with error handling, admin session checks, and retry support.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSubmissionDetail: Renders admin submission detail view with backend loading, error handling, credential validation, and retry logic.
frontend/src/pages/LoginChoice.tsx: Provides user or admin login flow, including Internet Identity login and manual admin credential form with session storage.
frontend/src/pages/UserChecklist.tsx: Displays user checklist form, handles photo capture, profile loading, backend submission, and validation.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: SessionStorage helpers for storing, retrieving, and clearing admin credentials and redirect messages.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors and provides helpers to detect backend-unavailable and invalid-credentials cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state and requirements, highlighting a pending feature to add dashboard filtering by date and store name.
